mapper.insert: insert into cu_schedule (staff_id, start_day, end_day, information) values (#{staffId}, #{startDay}, #{endDay}, #{information})
mapper.select: SELECT id, staff_id, DATE_FORMAT(start_day, '%m-%d') AS start_day, DATE_FORMAT(end_day, '%m-%d') AS end_day, information, YEAR(start_day) AS years, MONTH(start_day) AS month FROM cu_schedule ORDER BY start_day

SELECT id, staff_id, DATE_FORMAT(start_day,'%m-%d') AS start_mday, DATE_FORMAT(end_day,'%m-%d') AS end_mday, staff_id, start_day, end_day, information, YEAR(start_day) as years FROM cu_schedule WHERE id = #{id}
select month, count(month) AS sum from cu_schedule GROUP BY month HAVING COUNT(month) > 1;
select * from cu_schedule where month(start_day) = #{month} or month(end_day) = #{month};
